title: Winterworld (2009) (IDW Publishing) [GN]
description:
- Contains the Winterworld graphic novel which collects all 3 issues of the original miniseries and also collects the never released sequel, WinterSea. Published by IDW Publishing.

Genre: Post-Apocalyptic

- A CBR/CBZ viewer will be needed in order to view this content, which can be found here: http://www.cdisplay.me/

**I don't own or take credit for any of the content contained in this torrent, all credit goes to the creator(s) of the comic.**


Description:


In a bleak and desolate future, when our world has been encased in ice from pole to pole, an amoral adventurer and an orphaned girl form an unlikely alliance, and together fight tooth and nail to stay alive!

Out of print for twenty years, this brutal and suspenseful tale of survival in a frozen future by Chuck Dixon and Jorge Zaffino is one of the most influential comics works of the Eighties. Zaffino's stunning work on this story is considered his masterpiece and presented here in black and white for the first time.

Included in this deluxe edition of WinterWorld is the never-before-published sequel WinterSea also by Dixon and Zaffino.


** If you have any question please feel free to ask! **
